title: The Paranormal Pendulum - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/18/21
itunes:title: The Paranormal Pendulum - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/18/21
description:
George Noory and author Dan Baldwin explore his work as a psychic medium who uses pendulums to ask questions to spirits for clues to aid the police in solving crimes, how the subconscious influences the pendulum's answers, and whether the spirits are glad they have passed on to the other side.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
